note.p: Clergyman. Unitarian minister to the second congregation of Protestant dissenters, Belfast, 1871–90. Provisional committee member of the Association of Liberal Thinkers, 1878.

letter from M. D. Conway, 18 November 1878

note.term: second congregation of protestant dissenters, Belfast
